about_the_game:
=| WELCOME TO FREDDY`S ARCHIVE |=





An old company focused on creating entertaining eateries featuring singing animatronics - closes down after a series of accidents. Several attempts to rebuild fail, the company's reputation is permanently tarnished, and they fade into the shadows. One of the former owners leaves town, and a warehouse is built on the site of his house to store the equipment and property of the former restaurants. After many years, an advertisement appears in the newspapers for a night guard position at the old abandoned "Freddy`s Archive" warehouse

-|[A QUIET CITY WITH A SAD PAST:]|-

Local journalist Alex receives a letter from his long-missing father, asking him to visit an old family warehouse to learn more about his life. Fearing danger, he calls his friends to join him. Together, they travel far beyond the city to find something that was hidden long ago...
Meanwhile, there are sudden earthquakes in the city, causing the inhabitants of the city to be in danger, and some are forced to leave the city, while the rest believe that something bigger is involved, and all the clues lead to an old cursed warehouse not far outside the city called "Freddy`s Archive"




///Welcome to the Freddy's Archives:\[/i][/b][/h2]
An adventure where you'll delve into the tragic history of a once-popular company as you uncover more and more eerie secrets! Will you be able to live up to their reputation, or will you confirm the old legends that haunt this place!

Something terrible is rising from the depths, something that should have been dead long ago is making itself known. trapped, you are not alone - old robots gripped by a strange energy are after you. Investigate the various locations, gather more details about the company's past affairs, and escape the clutches of creepiness and fear alive!

- You are alone in a small room and they are coming for you!


- Danger is behind every door, be more vigilant:


- Explore, and hide, they are faster than you!




You've never been alone...
detailed_description:
=| WELCOME TO FREDDY`S ARCHIVE |=





An old company focused on creating entertaining eateries featuring singing animatronics - closes down after a series of accidents. Several attempts to rebuild fail, the company's reputation is permanently tarnished, and they fade into the shadows. One of the former owners leaves town, and a warehouse is built on the site of his house to store the equipment and property of the former restaurants. After many years, an advertisement appears in the newspapers for a night guard position at the old abandoned "Freddy`s Archive" warehouse

-|[A QUIET CITY WITH A SAD PAST:]|-

Local journalist Alex receives a letter from his long-missing father, asking him to visit an old family warehouse to learn more about his life. Fearing danger, he calls his friends to join him. Together, they travel far beyond the city to find something that was hidden long ago...
Meanwhile, there are sudden earthquakes in the city, causing the inhabitants of the city to be in danger, and some are forced to leave the city, while the rest believe that something bigger is involved, and all the clues lead to an old cursed warehouse not far outside the city called "Freddy`s Archive"




///Welcome to the Freddy's Archives:\[/i][/b][/h2]
An adventure where you'll delve into the tragic history of a once-popular company as you uncover more and more eerie secrets! Will you be able to live up to their reputation, or will you confirm the old legends that haunt this place!

Something terrible is rising from the depths, something that should have been dead long ago is making itself known. trapped, you are not alone - old robots gripped by a strange energy are after you. Investigate the various locations, gather more details about the company's past affairs, and escape the clutches of creepiness and fear alive!

- You are alone in a small room and they are coming for you!


- Danger is behind every door, be more vigilant:


- Explore, and hide, they are faster than you!




You've never been alone...
legal_notice: This game is the result of fan work, and is not part of the original Five Nights at Freddy's series by Scott Cawthon. The original Five Nights at Freddy's franchise is owned by Scott Games (Scott Cawthon).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and newer recommended
  • Processor: AMD FX(tm)-4350
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and newer recommended
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Remains Of The Past

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX(tm)-4350
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan 1.2 and later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan 1.2 and later

short_description: Welcome to Freddy's Archives, an old abandoned warehouse with some of the creepiest legends around! Alex, Steve, and Jesse - investigating paranormal activity, decide to visit this creepy place to find something interesting
